question: The centripetal force and centrifugal force are ______:
option1: equal in magnitude and have same direction
option2: unequal in magnitude and have same direction
option3: equal in magnitude and have opposite direction
option4: unequal in magnitude and have opposite direction
answer: equal in magnitude and have opposite direction
explanation: The centripetal force and centrifugal force are equal in magnitude and have opposite direction. Centrifugal force can be regarded as the reaction of centripetal force.
